name: Speech To Text with Nexmo & Microsoft Azure Speech Service API
description: Example using the Microsoft Azure Speech Service API to detect spoken language via phone call in real time and output the result to the console

HOSTNAME.description: The hostname of the app once deployed to Heroku

LANGUAGE.description: The language the Speech Service API should detect (default is en-GB)

KEY1.description: API Key1 for your Azure Speech Service API Instance

REGIONAL_API_ENDPOINT.description: The regional endpoint for your Azure Speech Service API Instance (eg. westeurope)
